164 static uint8_t a_check_busy_pin(vs1053b_handle_t *handle)
165 {
166  uint16_t i;
167  uint8_t dat;
168 
169  for (i = 0; i < 1000; i++) /* up to 1000ms */
170  {
171  if (handle->dreq_gpio_read(&dat) != 0) /* read failed */
172  {
173  return 2; /* return error */
174  }
175  if (dat != 0) /* if high */
176  {
177  break; /* break */
178  }
179 
180  handle->delay_ms(1); /* delay 1ms */
181  }
182 
183  if (i < 1000) /* check up to 1000ms */
184  {
185  return 0; /* success return 0 */
186  }
187  else
188  {
189  return 1; /* return error */
190  }
191 }

201 static uint8_t a_vs1053b_stop(vs1053b_handle_t *handle)
202 {
203  uint8_t res;
204  uint8_t dat0;
205  uint8_t dat1;
206  uint8_t buf[2];
207  uint8_t buf_init[32];
208  uint16_t i;
209  uint16_t prev;
210 
211  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
212  {
213  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
214 
215  return 1; /* return error */
216  }
217  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
218  if (res != 0) /* check result */
219  {
220  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
221 
222  return 1; /* return error */
223  }
224  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
225  prev &= ~(1 << 3); /* clear the settings */
226  prev |= 1 << 3; /* set the config */
227  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
228  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
229  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* write the mode */
230  if (res != 0) /* check result */
231  {
232  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write mode failed.\n"); /* write mode failed */
233 
234  return 1; /* return error */
235  }
236 
237  memset(buf_init, 0, sizeof(uint8_t) * 32); /* init */
238  for (i = 0; i < 64; i++) /* 64 times */
239  {
240  if (handle->spi_dat_write_cmd(buf_init, 32) != 0) /* push data */
241  {
242  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: fill buffer failed.\n"); /* fill buffer failed */
243 
244  return 1; /* return error */
245  }
246  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
247  {
248  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
249 
250  return 1; /* return error */
251  }
252  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
253  if (res != 0) /* check result */
254  {
255  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
256 
257  return 1; /* return error */
258  }
259  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
260  if ((prev & (1 << 3)) == 0) /* check cancel bit */
261  {
262  break; /* break */
263  }
264  }
265  if (i >= 64) /* check times */
266  {
267  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: cancel bit is invalid.\n"); /* cancel bit is invalid */
268 
269  return 1; /* return error */
270  }
271 
272  for (i = 0; i < 65; i++) /* 65 times */
273  {
274  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
275  {
276  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
277 
278  return 1; /* return error */
279  }
280  prev = 0x1E06; /* set addr */
281  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
282  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
283  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle,
284  VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
285  if (res != 0) /* check result */
286  {
287  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
288 
289  return 1; /* return error */
290  }
291  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
292  {
293  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
294 
295  return 1; /* return error */
296  }
297  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* read the ram */
298  if (res != 0) /* check result */
299  {
300  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read ram failed.\n"); /* read ram failed */
301 
302  return 1; /* return error */
303  }
304  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine data */
305  memset(buf_init, prev & 0xFF, sizeof(uint8_t) * 32); /* init */
306  if (handle->spi_dat_write_cmd(buf_init, 32) != 0) /* push data */
307  {
308  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: fill buffer failed.\n"); /* fill buffer failed */
309 
310  return 1; /* return error */
311  }
312  }
313 
314  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
315  {
316  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
317 
318  return 1; /* return error */
319  }
320  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT0, buf, 2); /* read the hdat0 */
321  if (res != 0) /* check result */
322  {
323  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat0 failed.\n"); /* read hdat0 failed */
324 
325  return 1; /* return error */
326  }
327  dat0 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
328  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT1, buf, 2); /* read the hdat1 */
329  if (res != 0) /* check result */
330  {
331  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat1 failed.\n"); /* read hdat1 failed */
332 
333  return 1; /* return error */
334  }
335  dat1 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
336  if ((dat0 != 0) || (dat1 != 0)) /* check dat0 */
337  {
338  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: dat0 and dat1 ara invalid.\n"); /* dat0 and dat1 ara invalid */
339 
340  return 1; /* return error */
341  }
342 
343  return 0; /* success return 0 */
344 }

351 static void a_period(vs1053b_handle_t *handle)
352 {
353  if (handle->period_enable != 0) /* if enable */
354  {
355  uint32_t sec;
356  uint32_t us;
357  uint64_t current_time;
358 
359  handle->timestamp_read(&sec, &us); /* read timestamp */
360  current_time = (((uint64_t)sec) * 1000000 + ((uint64_t)us)); /* create timestamp */
361  if (current_time - handle->timestamp >= handle->period) /* check period */
362  {
363  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* if not null */
364  {
365  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_PERIOD, handle->cur_pos); /* run the callback */
366  }
367  handle->timestamp = current_time; /* save the current timestamp */
368  }
369  }
370 }

381 static uint8_t a_vs1053b_write_wav_header(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_wav_t *wav)
382 {
383  uint8_t res;
384  uint8_t buf[44];
385 
386  buf[0] = handle->wav.chunk_id[0]; /* R */
387  buf[1] = handle->wav.chunk_id[1]; /* I */
388  buf[2] = handle->wav.chunk_id[2]; /* F */
389  buf[3] = handle->wav.chunk_id[3]; /* F */
390  buf[4] = (handle->wav.chunk_size >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set chunk size */
391  buf[5] = (handle->wav.chunk_size >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set chunk size */
392  buf[6] = (handle->wav.chunk_size >> 16) & 0xFF; /* set chunk size */
393  buf[7] = (handle->wav.chunk_size >> 24) & 0xFF; /* set chunk size */
394  buf[8] = handle->wav.format[0]; /* W */
395  buf[9] = handle->wav.format[1]; /* A */
396  buf[10] = handle->wav.format[2]; /* V */
397  buf[11] = handle->wav.format[3]; /* E */
398  buf[12] = handle->wav.sub_chunk1_id[0]; /* f */
399  buf[13] = handle->wav.sub_chunk1_id[1]; /* m */
400  buf[14] = handle->wav.sub_chunk1_id[2]; /* t */
401  buf[15] = handle->wav.sub_chunk1_id[3]; /* 0x00 */
402  buf[16] = (handle->wav.sub_chunk1_size >> 0) & 0xFF; /* 16 bytes */
403  buf[17] = (handle->wav.sub_chunk1_size >> 8) & 0xFF; /* 16 bytes */
404  buf[18] = (handle->wav.sub_chunk1_size >> 16) & 0xFF; /* 16 bytes */
405  buf[19] = (handle->wav.sub_chunk1_size >> 24) & 0xFF; /* 16 bytes */
406  buf[20] = (handle->wav.audio_format >> 0) & 0xFF; /* pcm */
407  buf[21] = (handle->wav.audio_format >> 8) & 0xFF; /* pcm */
408  buf[22] = (handle->wav.num_channel >> 0) & 0xFF; /* 1 channel */
409  buf[23] = (handle->wav.num_channel >> 8) & 0xFF; /* 1 channel */
410  buf[24] = (handle->wav.sample_rate >> 0) & 0xFF; /* set sample rate */
411  buf[25] = (handle->wav.sample_rate >> 8) & 0xFF; /* set sample rate */
412  buf[26] = (handle->wav.sample_rate >> 16) & 0xFF; /* set sample rate */
413  buf[27] = (handle->wav.sample_rate >> 24) & 0xFF; /* set sample rate */
414  buf[28] = (handle->wav.byte_rate >> 0) & 0xFF; /* double */
415  buf[29] = (handle->wav.byte_rate >> 8) & 0xFF; /* double */
416  buf[30] = (handle->wav.byte_rate >> 16) & 0xFF; /* double */
417  buf[31] = (handle->wav.byte_rate >> 24) & 0xFF; /* double */
418  buf[32] = (handle->wav.block_align >> 0) & 0xFF; /* 2 bytes */
419  buf[33] = (handle->wav.block_align >> 8) & 0xFF; /* 2 bytes */
420  buf[34] = (handle->wav.bit_per_sample >> 0) & 0xFF; /* 16 bits */
421  buf[35] = (handle->wav.bit_per_sample >> 8) & 0xFF; /* 16 bits */
422  buf[36] = handle->wav.sub_chunk2_id[0]; /* d */
423  buf[37] = handle->wav.sub_chunk2_id[1]; /* a */
424  buf[38] = handle->wav.sub_chunk2_id[2]; /* t */
425  buf[39] = handle->wav.sub_chunk2_id[3]; /* a */
426  buf[40] = (handle->wav.sub_chunk2_size >> 0) & 0xFF; /* init 0 */
427  buf[41] = (handle->wav.sub_chunk2_size >> 8) & 0xFF; /* init 0 */
428  buf[42] = (handle->wav.sub_chunk2_size >> 16) & 0xFF; /* init 0 */
429  buf[43] = (handle->wav.sub_chunk2_size >> 24) & 0xFF; /* init 0 */
430  res = handle->audio_write(0, 44, buf); /* write buffer */
431  if (res != 0) /* check result */
432  {
433  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio write failed.\n"); /* audio write failed */
434 
435  return 1; /* return error */
436  }
437 
438  return 0; /* success return 0 */
439 }

452 uint8_t vs1053b_set_diff(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_diff_t diff)
453 {
454  uint8_t res;
455  uint8_t buf[2];
456  uint16_t prev;
457 
458  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
459  {
460  return 2; /* return error */
461  }
462  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
463  {
464  return 3; /* return error */
465  }
466  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
467  {
468  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
469 
470  return 1; /* return error */
471  }
472 
473  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
474  if (res != 0) /* check result */
475  {
476  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
477 
478  return 1; /* return error */
479  }
480  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
481  prev &= ~(1 << 0); /* clear the settings */
482  prev |= diff << 0; /* set the config */
483  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
484  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
485  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* write the mode */
486  if (res != 0) /* check result */
487  {
488  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write mode failed.\n"); /* write mode failed */
489 
490  return 1; /* return error */
491  }
492 
493  return 0; /* success return 0 */
494 }

3911 uint8_t vs1053b_set_sample_rate(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint16_t rate, vs1053b_channel_t channel)

4655 uint8_t vs1053b_set_play_speed(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_play_speed_t speed)
4656 {
4657  uint8_t res;
4658  uint8_t buf[2];
4659  uint16_t prev;
4660 
4661  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
4662  {
4663  return 2; /* return error */
4664  }
4665  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
4666  {
4667  return 3; /* return error */
4668  }
4669 
4670  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4671  {
4672  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4673 
4674  return 1; /* return error */
4675  }
4676  prev = 0x1E04; /* set addr */
4677  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
4678  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
4679  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAMADDR, buf, 2); /* write the ram addr */
4680  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4681  {
4682  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram addr failed.\n"); /* write ram addr failed */
4683 
4684  return 1; /* return error */
4685  }
4686 
4687  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
4688  {
4689  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
4690 
4691  return 1; /* return error */
4692  }
4693  prev = speed; /* set play speed */
4694  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
4695  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
4696  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_WRAM, buf, 2); /* write the ram */
4697  if (res != 0) /* check result */
4698  {
4699  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write ram failed.\n"); /* write ram failed */
4700 
4701  return 1; /* return error */
4702  }
4703 
4704  return 0; /* success return 0 */
4705 }

5272 uint8_t vs1053b_process(vs1053b_handle_t *handle)
5273 {
5274  uint8_t res;
5275  uint8_t buf[2];
5276 
5277  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5278  {
5279  return 2; /* return error */
5280  }
5281  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5282  {
5283  return 3; /* return error */
5284  }
5285 
5286  if (handle->status == VS1053B_STATUS_STOP) /* check status */
5287  {
5288  return 4; /* not working */
5289  }
5290  else if (handle->status == VS1053B_STATUS_PLAY) /* play */
5291  {
5292  a_period(handle); /* run period callback */
5293  if ((handle->pause != 0) || (handle->status == VS1053B_STATUS_STOP)) /* if pause and return */
5294  {
5295  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5296  }
5297  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) == 0) /* if not busy */
5298  {
5299  if (handle->cur_pos >= handle->buf_pos) /* check buffer */
5300  {
5301  res = handle->audio_read(handle->cur_pos,
5302  VS1053B_BUFFER_SIZE, handle->buf); /* read buffer */
5303  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5304  {
5305  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio read failed.\n"); /* audio read failed */
5306 
5307  return 1; /* return error */
5308  }
5309  handle->buf_pos += VS1053B_BUFFER_SIZE; /* add pos */
5310  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
5311  {
5312  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_PLAY_READ,
5313  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
5314  }
5315  }
5316  if (handle->spi_dat_write_cmd(handle->buf +
5317  (handle->cur_pos %
5318  VS1053B_BUFFER_SIZE), 32) != 0) /* push data */
5319  {
5320  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: fill buffer failed.\n"); /* fill buffer failed */
5321 
5322  return 1; /* return error */
5323  }
5324  handle->cur_pos += 32; /* current position +32 */
5325  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
5326  {
5327  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_PLAY_WRITE,
5328  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
5329  }
5330  if (handle->cur_pos >= handle->size) /* check end */
5331  {
5332  if (a_vs1053b_stop(handle) != 0) /* stop audio */
5333  {
5334  return 1; /* return error */
5335  }
5336  if (handle->audio_deinit() != 0) /* audio deinit */
5337  {
5338  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio deinit failed.\n"); /* audio deinit failed */
5339 
5340  return 1; /* return error */
5341  }
5342  handle->status = VS1053B_STATUS_STOP; /* set not working */
5343  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
5344  {
5345  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_PLAY_END,
5346  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
5347  }
5348  }
5349  }
5350 
5351  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5352  }
5353  else if (handle->status == VS1053B_STATUS_RECORD) /* record */
5354  {
5355  uint16_t i;
5356  uint16_t dat1;
5357 
5358  a_period(handle); /* run period callback */
5359  if ((handle->pause != 0) || (handle->status == VS1053B_STATUS_STOP)) /* if pause and return */
5360  {
5361  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5362  }
5363 
5364  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT1, buf, 2); /* read the hdat1 */
5365  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5366  {
5367  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat1 failed.\n"); /* read hdat1 failed */
5368 
5369  return 1; /* return error */
5370  }
5371  dat1 = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
5372  if ((dat1 >= 256) && (dat1 < 896)) /* check range */
5373  {
5374  i = 0; /* init 0 */
5375  while (i < 512) /* 512 bytes */
5376  {
5377  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT0, buf, 2); /* read the hdat0 */
5378  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5379  {
5380  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat0 failed.\n"); /* read hdat0 failed */
5381 
5382  return 1; /* return error */
5383  }
5384  handle->buf[i++] = buf[1]; /* save low part */
5385  handle->buf[i++] = buf[0]; /* save high part */
5386  }
5387  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
5388  {
5389  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_RECORD_READ,
5390  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
5391  }
5392  res = handle->audio_write(handle->cur_pos, 512, handle->buf); /* write buffer */
5393  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5394  {
5395  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio write failed.\n"); /* audio write failed */
5396 
5397  return 1; /* return error */
5398  }
5399  handle->cur_pos += 512; /* add 512 bytes */
5400  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
5401  {
5402  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_RECORD_WRITE,
5403  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
5404  }
5405  }
5406  else if (dat1 >= 896)
5407  {
5408  i = 0; /* init 0 */
5409  while (i < 512) /* 512 bytes */
5410  {
5411  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_HDAT0, buf, 2); /* read the hdat0 */
5412  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5413  {
5414  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read hdat0 failed.\n"); /* read hdat0 failed */
5415 
5416  return 1; /* return error */
5417  }
5418  handle->buf[i++] = buf[1]; /* save low part */
5419  handle->buf[i++] = buf[0]; /* save high part */
5420  }
5421  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
5422  {
5423  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_RECORD_READ,
5424  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
5425  }
5426  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
5427  {
5428  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_RECORD_OVER,
5429  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
5430  }
5431  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: buffer is over.\n"); /* buffer is over */
5432  }
5433  else
5434  {
5435  /* do nothing */
5436  }
5437 
5438  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5439  }
5440  else
5441  {
5442  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: status is invalid.\n"); /* status is invalid */
5443 
5444  return 5; /* return error */
5445  }
5446 }

5467  }

5496  uint32_t us;
5497 
5498  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5499  {
5500  return 2; /* return error */
5501  }

5510  return 4; /* return error */

5554 uint8_t vs1053b_record(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, char *path, uint32_t sample_rate)
5555 {
5556  uint8_t res;
5557  uint32_t sec;
5558  uint32_t us;
5559 
5560  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5561  {
5562  return 2; /* return error */
5563  }
5564  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5565  {
5566  return 3; /* return error */
5567  }
5568  if (handle->status != 0) /* check played */

5570  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio working.\n"); /* audio working */
5571 
5572  return 4; /* return error */
5573  }
5574 
5575  if (handle->pause != 0) /* if pause and return */
5576  {
5577  handle->pause = 0; /* recover */
5578 
5579  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5580  }
5581 
5582  res = handle->audio_init(1, path, &handle->size); /* audio init */
5583  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5584  {

5586 
5587  return 1; /* return error */
5588  }
5589  handle->wav.chunk_id[0] = 'R'; /* R */

5602  handle->wav.sub_chunk1_size = 16; /* 16 bytes */

5605  handle->wav.sample_rate = sample_rate; /* set sample rate */

5615  {
5616  return 1; /* return error */
5617  }
5618  handle->timestamp_read(&sec, &us); /* read timestamp */

5639 uint8_t vs1053b_stop(vs1053b_handle_t *handle)
5640 {
5641  uint8_t res;
5642  uint8_t buf[2];
5643  uint16_t prev;
5644 
5645  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5646  {
5647  return 2; /* return error */
5648  }
5649  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5650  {
5651  return 3; /* return error */
5652  }
5653  if (handle->status == 0) /* check played */
5654  {
5655  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio not working.\n"); /* audio not working */
5656 
5657  return 4; /* return error */
5658  }
5659 
5660  if (handle->status == 1) /* play */
5661  {
5662  if (a_vs1053b_stop(handle) != 0) /* stop audio */
5663  {
5664  return 1; /* return error */
5665  }
5666  if (handle->audio_deinit() != 0) /* audio deinit */
5667  {
5668  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio deinit failed.\n"); /* audio deinit failed */
5669 
5670  return 1; /* return error */
5671  }
5672  handle->status = VS1053B_STATUS_STOP; /* set not working */
5673  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
5674  {
5675  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_PLAY_END,
5676  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
5677  }
5678 
5679  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5680  }
5681  else if (handle->status == 2) /* record */
5682  {
5683  if (a_check_busy_pin(handle) != 0) /* check busy */
5684  {
5685  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: chip is busy.\n"); /* chip is busy */
5686 
5687  return 1; /* return error */
5688  }
5689 
5690  res = a_vs1053b_spi_read(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* read the mode */
5691  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5692  {
5693  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: read mode failed.\n"); /* read mode failed */
5694 
5695  return 1; /* return error */
5696  }
5697  prev = ((uint16_t)(buf[0]) << 8) | buf[1]; /* combine the config */
5698  prev &= ~(1 << 12); /* clear the settings */
5699  prev |= 0 << 12; /* set the config */
5700  buf[0] = (prev >> 8) & 0xFF; /* get msb */
5701  buf[1] = (prev >> 0) & 0xFF; /* get lsb */
5702  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, VS1053B_REG_MODE, buf, 2); /* write the mode */
5703  if (res != 0) /* check result */
5704  {
5705  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: write mode failed.\n"); /* write mode failed */
5706 
5707  return 1; /* return error */
5708  }
5709  handle->wav.chunk_size = handle->cur_pos - 44 + 36; /* set chunk size */
5710  handle->wav.sub_chunk2_size = handle->cur_pos - 44; /* set sub chunk2 size */
5711  if (a_vs1053b_write_wav_header(handle, &handle->wav) != 0) /* write wav header */
5712  {
5713  return 1; /* return error */
5714  }
5715  if (handle->audio_deinit() != 0) /* audio deinit */
5716  {
5717  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: audio deinit failed.\n"); /* audio deinit failed */
5718 
5719  return 1; /* return error */
5720  }
5721  handle->status = VS1053B_STATUS_STOP; /* set not working */
5722  if (handle->receive_callback != NULL) /* check not null */
5723  {
5724  handle->receive_callback(VS1053B_TYPE_RECORD_END,
5725  handle->cur_pos); /* run callback */
5726  }
5727 
5728  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5729  }
5730  else
5731  {
5732  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: status is invalid.\n"); /* status is invalid */
5733 
5734  return 5; /* return error */
5735  }
5736 }

5751 
5752  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */

5857 uint8_t vs1053b_parse_info(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, uint16_t dat0, uint16_t dat1, vs1053b_audio_info_t *info)
5858 {
5859  const float bitrate[2][16]= {{0.0f, 8.0f, 16.0f, 24.0f, 32.0f, 40.0f, 48.0f, 56.0f, 64.0f,
5860  80.0f, 96.0f, 112.0f, 128.0f, 144.0f, 160.0f, 0.0f},
5861  {0.0f, 32.0f, 40.0f, 48.0f, 56.0f, 64.0f, 80.0f, 96.0f, 112.0f,
5862  128.0f, 160.0f, 192.0f, 224.0f, 256.0f, 320.0f, 0.0f}};
5863 
5864  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5865  {
5866  return 2; /* return error */
5867  }
5868  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5869  {
5870  return 3; /* return error */
5871  }
5872 
5873  switch (dat1)
5874  {
5875  case VS1053B_FORMAT_WAV : /* wav */
5876  {
5877  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_WAV; /* set wav format */
5878  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
5879  strncpy(info->format_name, "wav", 32); /* copy name */
5880  info->kbps = (float)(dat0) * 8.0f / 1000.0f; /* get wav kbps */
5881 
5882  break; /* break */
5883  }
5884  case VS1053B_FORMAT_MIDI : /* midi */
5885  {
5886  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_MIDI; /* set midi format */
5887  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
5888  strncpy(info->format_name, "midi", 32); /* copy name */
5889  info->kbps = (float)(dat0) * 8.0f / 1000.0f; /* get midi kbps */
5890 
5891  break; /* break */
5892  }
5893  case VS1053B_FORMAT_AAC_ADTS : /* acc adts */
5894  {
5895  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_AAC_ADTS; /* set acc adts format */
5896  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
5897  strncpy(info->format_name, "aac_adts", 32); /* copy name */
5898  info->kbps = (float)(dat0) * 8.0f / 1000.0f; /* get acc adts kbps */
5899 
5900  break; /* break */
5901  }
5902  case VS1053B_FORMAT_AAC_ADIF : /* acc adif */
5903  {
5904  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_AAC_ADIF; /* set acc adif format */
5905  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
5906  strncpy(info->format_name, "aac_adif", 32); /* copy name */
5907  info->kbps = (float)(dat0) * 8.0f / 1000.0f; /* get acc adif kbps */
5908 
5909  break; /* break */
5910  }
5911  case VS1053B_FORMAT_AAC_MP4 : /* acc mp4 */
5912  {
5913  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_AAC_MP4; /* set acc mp4 format */
5914  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
5915  strncpy(info->format_name, "aac_mp4", 32); /* copy name */
5916  info->kbps = (float)(dat0) * 8.0f / 1000.0f; /* get acc mp4 kbps */
5917 
5918  break; /* break */
5919  }
5920  case VS1053B_FORMAT_OGG : /* ogg */
5921  {
5922  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_OGG; /* set ogg format */
5923  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
5924  strncpy(info->format_name, "ogg", 32); /* copy name */
5925  info->kbps = (float)(dat0) * 8.0f / 1000.0f; /* get ogg kbps */
5926 
5927  break; /* break */
5928  }
5929  case VS1053B_FORMAT_WMA : /* wma */
5930  {
5931  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_WMA; /* set wma format */
5932  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
5933  strncpy(info->format_name, "wma", 32); /* copy name */
5934  info->kbps = (float)(dat0) * 8.0f / 1000.0f; /* get wma kbps */
5935 
5936  break; /* break */
5937  }
5938  case VS1053B_FORMAT_FLAC : /* flac */
5939  {
5940  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_FLAC; /* set flac format */
5941  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
5942  strncpy(info->format_name, "flac", 32); /* copy name */
5943  info->kbps = (float)(dat0) * 8.0f / 1000.0f; /* get flac kbps */
5944 
5945  break; /* break */
5946  }
5947  default : /* mp3 */
5948  {
5949  uint16_t tmp;
5950 
5951  info->format = VS1053B_FORMAT_MP3; /* set mp3 format */
5952  memset(info->format_name, 0, sizeof(char) * 32); /* init buffer */
5953  strncpy(info->format_name, "mp3", 32); /* copy name */
5954  tmp = (dat1 >> 3) & 0x03; /* get index */
5955  if (tmp == 3) /* index 1 */
5956  {
5957  info->kbps = bitrate[1][(dat0 >> 12) & 0xF]; /* get mp3 kbps */
5958  }
5959  else /* index 0 */
5960  {
5961  info->kbps = bitrate[0][(dat0 >> 12) & 0xF]; /* get mp3 kbps */
5962  }
5963  }
5964 
5965  break; /* break */
5966  }
5967 
5968  return 0; /* success return 0 */
5969 }

5983 uint8_t vs1053b_get_patch(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, vs1053b_patch_t type, const uint16_t **patch_addr, uint16_t *len)
5984 {
5985  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
5986  {
5987  return 2; /* return error */
5988  }
5989  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
5990  {
5991  return 3; /* return error */
5992  }
5993 
5994  if (type == VS1053B_PATCH_FLAC) /* flac */
5995  {
5996  *patch_addr = gsc_vs1053b_patch_flac_plugin; /* set flac plugin address */
5997  *len = VS1053B_PATCH_FLAC_PLUGIN_SIZE; /* set flac plugin size */
5998  }
5999  else /* wav */
6000  {
6001  *patch_addr = gsc_vs1053b_patch_wav_plugin; /* set wav plugin address */
6002  *len = VS1053B_PATCH_WAV_PLUGIN_SIZE; /* set wav plugin size */
6003  }

6006 }
6007 
6020 uint8_t vs1053b_load_patch(vs1053b_handle_t *handle, const uint16_t *patch, uint16_t len)
6021 {
6022  uint8_t res;
6023  uint8_t buf[2];
6024  uint16_t i;
6025  uint16_t addr;
6026  uint16_t n;
6027  uint16_t val;
6028 
6029  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */
6030  {
6031  return 2; /* return error */
6032  }
6033  if (handle->inited != 1) /* check handle initialization */
6034  {
6035  return 3; /* return error */
6036  }
6037 
6038  i = 0; /* init 0 */
6039  while (i < len) /* loop */
6040  {
6041  addr = patch[i++]; /* get addr */
6042  n = patch[i++]; /* get n */
6043  if ((n & 0x8000U) != 0) /* rle run, replicate n samples */
6044  {
6045  n &= 0x7FFFU; /* & */
6046  val = patch[i++]; /* get a val */
6047  while (n--) /* loop */
6048  {
6049  buf[0] = (val >> 8) & 0xFF; /* high part */
6050  buf[1] = (val >> 0) & 0xFF; /* low part */
6051  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, (uint8_t)addr, buf, 2); /* write patch */
6052  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6053  {
6054  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: load patch failed.\n"); /* load patch failed */
6055 
6056  return 1; /* return error */
6057  }
6058  }
6059  }
6060  else /* copy run, copy n sample */
6061  {
6062  while (n--) /* loop */
6063  {
6064  val = patch[i++]; /* get a val */
6065  buf[0] = (val >> 8) & 0xFF; /* high part */
6066  buf[1] = (val >> 0) & 0xFF; /* low part */
6067  res = a_vs1053b_spi_write(handle, (uint8_t)addr, buf, 2); /* write patch */
6068  if (res != 0) /* check result */
6069  {
6070  handle->debug_print("vs1053b: load patch failed.\n"); /* load patch failed */
6071 
6072  return 1; /* return error */
6073  }
6074  }
6075  }
6076  }
6077 
6078  return 0; /* success return 0 */
6079 }
6080

6095  if (handle == NULL) /* check handle */

6097  return 2; /* return error */
6098  }

6100  {
6101  return 3; /* return error */
6102  }
6103 
6104  return a_vs1053b_spi_write_data(handle, buf, len); /* write data */
6105 }

6181 uint8_t vs1053b_info(vs1053b_info_t *info)
6182 {

6184  {
6185  return 2; /* return error */
6186  }
6187

6189  strncpy(info->chip_name, CHIP_NAME, 32); /* copy chip name */
6190  strncpy(info->manufacturer_name, MANUFACTURER_NAME, 32); /* copy manufacturer name */
6191  strncpy(info->interface, "SPI", 8); /* copy interface name */
6192  info->supply_voltage_min_v = SUPPLY_VOLTAGE_MIN; /* set minimal supply voltage */
6193  info->supply_voltage_max_v = SUPPLY_VOLTAGE_MAX; /* set maximum supply voltage */
6194  info->max_current_ma = MAX_CURRENT; /* set maximum current */
6195  info->temperature_max = TEMPERATURE_MAX; /* set minimal temperature */
6196  info->temperature_min = TEMPERATURE_MIN; /* set maximum temperature */
6197  info->driver_version = DRIVER_VERSION; /* set driver version */
6198
